norm  $ 1 0.000005 10.20027730826997 50 5 50
zoom  $ 1 0.000005 10.20027730826997 50 5 50
pan   $ 1 0.000005 10.20027730826997 50 5 50
simsp $ 1 0.000005 382.76258214399064 50 5 50
cursp $ 1 0.000005 10.20027730826997 17 5 50

Resistor
# idk why 0
# resistance in ohms
r x1 y1 x2 y2 0 r

Wire
# idk why 0
w x1 y1 x2 y2 0

Diode
# idk why 2
# for now I'll only use type: 1N5711
d x1 y1 x2 y2 2 TYPE

OpAmp
a x1 y1 x2 y2 8 15 -15 1000000 0 0 100000
a 0 10 40 10 8 15 -15 1000000 00 100000

Origin
$ 1 0.000005 10.20027730826997 50 5 50
w -10 0 10 0 0
w 0 -10 0 10 0

+ term at 0,0 OPAMP:
a 0 16 48 16 8 15 -15 1000000 0 0 100000
other input at 0,32
aka:
w 0 32 -10 32 0
